mapper.insert: insert into member_dm values( member_dm_seq.nextval, #{dmSender}, #{dmReceiver}, #{dmContent}, sysdate, 0 )
mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, dm_sender as dmSender, dm_receiver as dmReceiver, dm_content as dmContent, to_char(dm_date,'""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') as dmDate, dm_readchk as dmReadChk from member_dm where member_id = #{memberId} order by 1 desc
